golem.util.logging

Class Logging

  • golem.util.logging.Logging

  • public class Logging

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.lang.String asYaml(java.lang.String methodName, kotlin.Pair nameValuePairs)
      Dumps a set of variables out as a YAML formatted debug message.
      static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(java.lang.Object instance)
      MATLAB friendly replacement for LoggerFactory.getLogger. Calls logback manually if we are being called from within a MATLAB context, as if we didn't slf4j will break and find MATLABs StaticLoggerBinder instance. If we aren't in a MATLAB context, call LoggerFactory.getLogger as usual.
      static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(java.lang.String name)
      MATLAB friendly replacement for LoggerFactory.getLogger. Calls logback manually if we are being called from within a MATLAB context, as if we didn't slf4j will break and find MATLABs StaticLoggerBinder instance. If we aren't in a MATLAB context, call LoggerFactory.getLogger as usual.
      static boolean isMatlab()
      Whether we are in a MATLAB context or not (i.e. MATLAB classes are on the classpath)
      static void log(java.lang.Object $receiver, org.slf4j.event.Level level, kotlin.jvm.functions.Function0<java.lang.String> builder)
      A MATLAB-friendly wrapper around slf4j using kotlin extension functions to automatically get a reference to a logger and closures for lazy evaluation of the builder if logging is disabled (not currently supported directly in slf4j). Outputs at the chosen level the string returned by builder
      static void log(java.lang.Object $receiver, org.slf4j.event.Level level, java.lang.Object message)
      Support ordinary object printing. Note potential performance loss when logging is off vs a closure
      static void setLogLevel(java.lang.String name, org.slf4j.event.Level level)
      Set the log level for the logger associated with the fully qualified classname contained in name.
      static void setLogLevel(java.lang.Object instance, org.slf4j.event.Level level)
      Set the log level for the logger associated with the instance class.
      static void setLogLevel(java.lang.Object instance, java.lang.String level)
      Set the log level for the logger associated with the instance class.
      static void setLogLevel(java.lang.String name, java.lang.String level)
      Set the log level for the logger associated with the fully qualified classname contained in name.

        public static void log(java.lang.Object $receiver,
                       org.slf4j.event.Level level,

        A MATLAB-friendly wrapper around slf4j using kotlin extension functions to automatically get a reference to a logger and closures for lazy evaluation of the builder if logging is disabled (not currently supported directly in slf4j). Outputs at the chosen level the string returned by builder

      • getLogger

        public static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(java.lang.Object instance)

        MATLAB friendly replacement for LoggerFactory.getLogger. Calls logback manually if we are being called from within a MATLAB context, as if we didn't slf4j will break and find MATLABs StaticLoggerBinder instance. If we aren't in a MATLAB context, call LoggerFactory.getLogger as usual.

      • getLogger

        public static org.slf4j.Logger getLogger(java.lang.String name)

        MATLAB friendly replacement for LoggerFactory.getLogger. Calls logback manually if we are being called from within a MATLAB context, as if we didn't slf4j will break and find MATLABs StaticLoggerBinder instance. If we aren't in a MATLAB context, call LoggerFactory.getLogger as usual.
